categoryDescription: Commands that should be available only to a dev

blacklistuser.description: (Un)blocks a user from using the bot

target.description: The User ID you want to (un)block.

blacklistuser.notFound: Found no entry for this id.
blacklistuser.saved: `{user}` has been blacklisted from using the bot.
blacklistuser.removed: The blacklist entry for `{user}` has been removed.
blacklistuser.cantBlacklistDev: I can't blacklist a developer of the bot!

database.description: The database the entry is in.

eval.description: inject JavaScript code directly into the bot

exec.description: inject Bash code directly into the bot's shell

command.description: The bash command that should be executed

command_name.description: The name of the command to reload.

reload.invalidCommand: This is not a valid command.
reload.invalidPath: The specified path does not exist! Please note the case sensitivity of the path.
reload.reloaded:
The following `{count}` command(s) has/have been reloaded:
{commands}

reloadconfig.error:
An error occurred while reloading the config:
{err}

restart.alreadyRestarting: The bot is already performing a restart, please wait for it to finish. Message: {url}
restart.updateNPMError: ❌ Restart failed due to an NPM error. Check the console for more information.
restart.restartingError: ❌ Restart failed due to the an Node error. Check the console for more information.

activity.description: The status text you want me to have.

setactivity.set: My activity has been set to `{name}` of type `{type}`.
setactivity.reset: My activity has been set to `none`.

setchangelog.description: Updates the changelogs so users are up-to-date.
setchangelog.success: The changelog has been updated successfully.

setcountingnumber.description: Updates the last counting number for a channel, also resetting the last author.
setcountingnumber.unknownChannel: The provided channel id has not been found in this guild!
setcountingnumber.success: Counting for {channel} has been set to {number}.

todo.description: Get links to the developer's todo list(s).
todo.discordNotes: Dev notes in the support server
